name: keep-server-alive
description: Keep your free tier backends alive with auto-pinging and monitoring (alias for ping-me)
author: Eshank Tyagi

basic.title: Basic Usage
basic.description: Import and use the package in your code

cli.title: Command Line Usage
cli.description: Use the CLI tool to ping your endpoints
cli.code:
# Basic usage
npx keep-server-alive --url https://your-app.example.com

# Multiple endpoints
npx keep-server-alive --url https://api1.example.com --url https://api2.example.com

# Custom interval (in milliseconds)
npx keep-server-alive --url https://your-app.example.com --interval 60000

relatedPackages.name: ping-me
relatedPackages.description: The main package that this package aliases to

notes: This is an alias package that redirects to the main ping-me package
It exists for historical reasons and backward compatibility
It's recommended to use the main ping-me package directly for new projects
